subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Kyle Jones led St. Norbert to its first N.C.A.A. Division III title, stopping 32 shots in the Green Knights’ 2-0 victory against Plattsburgh State in Lake Placid, N.Y. St. Norbert (27-1-4) finished the season with a 29-game unbeaten streak, a record for all N.C.A.A. hockey divisions. Bryan Hince made 28 saves for Plattsburgh State (25-5-0).
